message: Let's split fairly, considering the inflation!
I understand the inflation puts me at a disadvantage. This offer is fair considering the time pressure.
Considering the increasing inflation, I'm being generous!
The inflation is hurting me more each round, and we are running out of time. This offer is my best attempt at a mutually beneficial agreement.
Time's running out, let's meet in the middle... sort of
Alice, let's be realistic.  The inflation heavily impacts me, but getting nothing helps neither of us.  I propose a 50/50 split.  Take it or leave it - I won't accept anything less.
